snippets: ACE inhibitors combined with potassium supplements or potassium‑sparing diuretics may cause significant hyperkalaemia; avoid unless under specialist supervision and with close monitoring. (BNF Interactions, accessed 20 Jun 2025)
Check serum potassium and creatinine within 1 week of any ACE inhibitor dose adjustment or addition of interacting medicine. (NICE NG136 Hypertension, 2019)
